title: Understanding Excel Functions
text: Excel provides various functions to perform calculations on data. These functions can help in summarizing and analyzing data efficiently.

title: Identifying the Purpose of Functions
text: Each Excel function has a specific purpose. For example, some functions are used to add numbers, while others are used to find the average or count the number of entries.

title: Focusing on the Average Function
text: The function used to calculate the average of a range of numbers in Excel is specifically designed to find the mean value of the numbers.

title: Choosing the Correct Function
text: The function that calculates the average of a range of numbers is called AVERAGE.
